007package tagalong.subsystems.micro;
008
009import com.ctre.phoenix6.signals.InvertedValue;
010import edu.wpi.first.math.controller.ElevatorFeedforward;
011import edu.wpi.first.math.trajectory.TrapezoidProfile;
012import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.RobotController;
013import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation.BatterySim;
014import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation.ElevatorSim;
015import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation.RoboRioSim;
016import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard.Mechanism2d;
017import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard.MechanismLigament2d;
018import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard.SmartDashboard;
019import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.util.Color;
020import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.util.Color8Bit;
021import tagalong.TagalongConfiguration;
022import tagalong.math.AlgebraicUtils;
023import tagalong.subsystems.micro.confs.ElevatorConf;
024
025/**
026 * Elevator Microsystem
027 */
028public class Elevator extends Microsystem {
029  /**
030   * Configuration for the elevator
031   */
032  public final ElevatorConf _elevatorConf;
033
034  /* -------- Hardware: motors and sensors -------- */
035
036  /* -------- Control: states and constants -------- */
037  /**
038   * Ratio between motor rotations and drum rotations
039   */
040  protected final double _motorToMechRatio;
041  /**
042   * Minimum height of the elevator in meters,
043   * Maximum height of the elevator in meters
044   */
045  public final double _elevatorMinHeightM, _elevatorMaxHeightM;
046  /**
047   * Maximum velocity of the elevator in meters per second,
048   * Maximum acceleration of the elevator in meters per second squared
049   */
050  public final double _maxVelocityMPS, _maxAccelerationMPS2;
051  /**
052   * Default lower tolerance of the elevator in meters,
053   * Default upper tolerance of the elevator in meters
054   */
055  public final double _defaultElevatorLowerToleranceM, _defaultElevatorUpperToleranceM;
056  /**
057   * Power for zeroing the elevator
058   */
059  public final double _elevatorZeroingPower;
060  /**
061   * Positional tolerance in meters for zeroing the elevator
062   */
063  public final double _elevatorZeroingStallToleranceM;
064  /**
065   * Duration of stalling in seconds necessary for the elevator zero command to finish
066   */
067  public final double _elevatorZeroingDurationS;
068
069  /* -------- Control: controllers and utilities -------- */
070  /**
071   * Feedforward model for the elevator
072   */
073  protected ElevatorFeedforward _elevatorFF;
074
075  /* -------- Sim -------- */
076  /**
077   * Simulation for the elevator
078   */
079  protected ElevatorSim _elevatorSim;
080  /**
081   * Base stage ligament
082   */
083  protected MechanismLigament2d _elevatorBaseStage;
084  /**
085   * Stage 1 ligament
086   */
087  protected MechanismLigament2d _elevatorStage1;
088  /**
089   * Velocity of the simulated elevator in meters per second
090   */
091  protected double _simVelocityMPS;
092  /**
093   * Whether or not the primary motor is inverted
094   */
095  protected boolean _primaryMotorInverted;
096
097  /**
098   * Constructor that creates an elevator microsystem with the below configurations
099   *
100   * @param conf Configuration for the elevator
101   */
102  public Elevator(ElevatorConf conf) {
103    super(conf);
104    _elevatorConf = conf;
105
106    if (_configuredMicrosystemDisable) {
107      _motorToMechRatio = 1.0;
108      _elevatorMinHeightM = 0.0;
109      _elevatorMaxHeightM = 0.0;
110      _maxVelocityMPS = 0.0;
111      _maxAccelerationMPS2 = 0.0;
112      _defaultElevatorLowerToleranceM = 0.0;
113      _defaultElevatorUpperToleranceM = 0.0;
114      _elevatorZeroingPower = 0.0;
115      _elevatorZeroingStallToleranceM = 0.0;
116      _elevatorZeroingDurationS = 0.0;
117      return;
118    }
119
120    _elevatorFF = _elevatorConf.feedForward;
121    _trapProfile = new TrapezoidProfile(_elevatorConf.trapezoidalLimits);
122    _curState.position = getElevatorHeightM();
123    _motorToMechRatio = _elevatorConf.motorToMechRatio;
124    _elevatorMinHeightM = _elevatorConf.positionalMin;
125    _elevatorMaxHeightM = _elevatorConf.positionalMax;
126    _maxVelocityMPS = _elevatorConf.trapezoidalLimitsVelocity;
127    _maxAccelerationMPS2 = _elevatorConf.trapezoidalLimitsAcceleration;
128    _defaultElevatorLowerToleranceM = _elevatorConf.defaultLowerTolerance;
129    _defaultElevatorUpperToleranceM = _elevatorConf.defaultUpperTolerance;
130    _elevatorZeroingPower = -Math.abs(_elevatorConf.elevatorZeroingPower);
131    _elevatorZeroingStallToleranceM = _elevatorConf.elevatorZeroingStallToleranceM;
132    _elevatorZeroingDurationS = _elevatorConf.elevatorZeroingDurationS;
133
134    configAllDevices();
135  }
136
137  // Override to ensure the position config happens after the devices are configured
138  @Override
139  public void configAllDevices() {
140    super.configAllDevices();
141
142    // FUTURE DEV: Look into if all motors or just the leader need their positions set?
143    // for (var motor : _allMotors) motor.setPosition(0.0);
144    _primaryMotor.setPosition(0.0);
145  }
146
147  /**
148   * Calculates the next state according to the trapezoidal profile and requests the elevator
149   * motor(s) to arrive at the next position with feedforward
150   */
151  public void followLastProfile() {
152    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
153      return;
154    }
155    TrapezoidProfile.State nextState =
156        _trapProfile.calculate(TagalongConfiguration.LOOP_PERIOD_S, _curState, _goalState);
157
158    _primaryMotor.setControl(_requestedPositionVoltage
159                                 .withPosition(metersToMotor(nextState.position))
160                                 // State is in meters, so the FF can handle the units directly
161                                 .withFeedForward(_elevatorFF.calculate(
162                                     nextState.velocity,
163                                     (nextState.velocity - _curState.velocity)
164                                         / TagalongConfiguration.LOOP_PERIOD_S
165                                 )));
166
167    if (_isShuffleboardMicro) {
168      _targetPositionEntry.setDouble(nextState.position);
169      _targetVelocityEntry.setDouble(nextState.velocity);
170    }
171
172    _curState = nextState;
173  }
174
175  /**
176   * Creates a new trapezoidal profile for the elevator
177   *
178   * @param goalPositionM   The goal position to reach, in meters
179   * @param goalVelocityMPS The goal velocity to reach, in meters per second
180   */
181  public void setElevatorProfile(double goalPositionM, double goalVelocityMPS) {
182    setElevatorProfile(goalPositionM, goalVelocityMPS, _maxVelocityMPS);
183  }
184
185  /**
186   * Creates a new trapezoidal profile for the elevator
187   *
188   * @param goalPositionM   The goal position to reach, in meters
189   * @param goalVelocityMPS The goal velocity to reach, in meters per second
190   * @param maxVelocityMPS  The maximum velocity, in meters per second
191   */
192  public void setElevatorProfile(
193      double goalPositionM, double goalVelocityMPS, double maxVelocityMPS
194  ) {
195    setElevatorProfile(goalPositionM, goalVelocityMPS, maxVelocityMPS, _maxAccelerationMPS2);
196  }
197
198  /**
199   * Creates a new trapezoidal profile for the elevator
200   *
201   * @param goalPositionM   The goal position to reach, in meters
202   * @param goalVelocityMPS The goal velocity to reach, in meters per second
203   * @param maxVelocityMPS  The maximum velocity, in meters per second
204   * @param maxAccelerationMPS2 The maximum acceleration, in meters per second squared
205   */
206  public void setElevatorProfile(
207      double goalPositionM,
208      double goalVelocityMPS,
209      double maxVelocityMPS,
210      double maxAccelerationMPS2
211  ) {
212    setElevatorProfile(goalPositionM, goalVelocityMPS, maxVelocityMPS, maxAccelerationMPS2, true);
213  }
214
215  /**
216   * Creates a new trapezoidal profile for the elevator
217   *
218   * @param goalPositionM       The goal position to reach, in meters
219   * @param goalVelocityMPS     The goal velocity to reach, in meters per second
220   * @param maxVelocityMPS      The maximum velocity, in meters per second
221   * @param maxAccelerationMPS2 The maximum acceleration, in meters per second squared
222   * @param setCurrentState     True if the profiles current state should base itself off sensor
223   *     values rather than continue from the existing state
224   */
225  public void setElevatorProfile(
226      double goalPositionM,
227      double goalVelocityMPS,
228      double maxVelocityMPS,
229      double maxAccelerationMPS2,
230      boolean setCurrentState
231  ) {
232    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
233      return;
234    }
235    setFollowProfile(false);
236
237    if (setCurrentState) {
238      _curState.position = getElevatorHeightM();
239      _curState.velocity = getElevatorVelocityMPS();
240    }
241
242    _goalState.position =
243        AlgebraicUtils.clamp(goalPositionM, _elevatorMinHeightM, _elevatorMaxHeightM);
244    _goalState.velocity = goalVelocityMPS;
245
246    _trapProfile = new TrapezoidProfile(
247        (maxVelocityMPS >= _maxVelocityMPS || maxAccelerationMPS2 >= _maxAccelerationMPS2)
248            ? _elevatorConf.trapezoidalLimits
249            : new TrapezoidProfile.Constraints(maxVelocityMPS, maxAccelerationMPS2)
250    );
251
252    _profileTimer.restart();
253  }
254
255  /**
256   * Gets the height of the elevator in meters
257   *
258   * @return height in meters
259   */
260  public double getElevatorHeightM() {
261    return motorToMeters(getPrimaryMotorPosition());
262  }
263
264  /**
265   * Gets the velocity of the elevator in meters per second
266   *
267   * @return velocity in meters per second
268   */
269  public double getElevatorVelocityMPS() {
270    return motorToMeters(getPrimaryMotorVelocity());
271  }
272
273  /**
274   * Sets the velocity of the elevator in MPS
275   *
276   * @param mps    Desired velocity in meters per second
277   * @param withFF with feedforward
278   */
279  public void setElevatorVelocity(double mps, boolean withFF) {
280    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
281      return;
282    }
283
284    setFollowProfile(false);
285    _primaryMotor.setControl(_requestedVelocityVoltage.withVelocity(metersToMotor(mps))
286                                 .withFeedForward(withFF ? _elevatorFF.calculate(mps, 0.0) : 0.0));
287  }
288
289  /**
290   * Clamps the elevator position to be within height limits
291   *
292   * @param target goal position of the elevator in meters
293   * @return clamped goal position in meters
294   */
295  public double clampElevatorPosition(double target) {
296    return AlgebraicUtils.clamp(target, _elevatorMinHeightM, _elevatorMaxHeightM);
297  }
298
299  @Override
300  public void onEnable() {
301    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
302      return;
303    }
304    super.onEnable();
305
306    if (_isFFTuningMicro) {
307      _elevatorFF = new ElevatorFeedforward(
308          _KSEntry.getDouble(_elevatorFF.ks),
309          _KGEntry.getDouble(_elevatorFF.kg),
310          _KVEntry.getDouble(_elevatorFF.kv),
311          _KAEntry.getDouble(_elevatorFF.ka)
312      );
313      _primaryMotor.setControl(_requestedPositionVoltage.withFeedForward(_elevatorFF.ks));
314    }
315  }
316
317  @Override
318  public void onDisable() {
319    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
320      return;
321    }
322
323    super.onDisable();
324  }
325
326  @Override
327  public void periodic() {
328    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
329      return;
330    } else if (motorResetConfig()) {
331      setFollowProfile(false);
332      setElevatorProfile(getElevatorHeightM(), 0.0);
333      _primaryMotor.set(0.0);
334    }
335    if (_followProfile) {
336      followLastProfile();
337    }
338  }
339
340  @Override
341  public void simulationInit() {
342    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
343      return;
344    }
345    _elevatorSim = new ElevatorSim(
346        _elevatorConf.motorTypes[0].simSupplier.apply(_elevatorConf.numMotors),
347        _motorToMechRatio,
348        _elevatorConf.carriageMassValue,
349        _elevatorConf.drumDiameter / 2.0,
350        _elevatorMinHeightM,
351        _elevatorMaxHeightM,
352        true,
353        0
354    );
355    _primaryMotorSim = _primaryMotor.getSimState();
356    _mechanism = new Mechanism2d(_elevatorConf.mech2dDim, _elevatorConf.mech2dDim);
357    _root =
358        _mechanism.getRoot(_elevatorConf.name, _elevatorConf.lineLength, _elevatorConf.lineLength);
359    _elevatorBaseStage = _root.append(new MechanismLigament2d(
360        "BaseStage",
361        _elevatorConf.lineLength,
362        180 + _elevatorConf.angle,
363        6,
364        new Color8Bit(Color.kAliceBlue)
365    ));
366    _elevatorStage1 = _root.append(new MechanismLigament2d(
367        "Stage1",
368        _elevatorConf.lineLength,
369        _elevatorConf.angle,
370        6,
371        new Color8Bit(Color.kLightSalmon)
372    ));
373    SmartDashboard.putData("SIM: " + _conf.name, _mechanism);
374    _primaryMotorInverted = _conf.motorDirection[0] == InvertedValue.Clockwise_Positive;
375  }
376
377  @Override
378  public void simulationPeriodic() {
379    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
380      return;
381    }
382    _elevatorSim.setInputVoltage(_primaryMotor.getMotorVoltage().getValue());
383    _elevatorSim.update(TagalongConfiguration.LOOP_PERIOD_S);
384
385    double simAccelMPS2 = (_elevatorSim.getVelocityMetersPerSecond() - _simVelocityMPS)
386        / TagalongConfiguration.LOOP_PERIOD_S;
387    _simVelocityMPS = _elevatorSim.getVelocityMetersPerSecond();
388
389    _primaryMotorSim.setRawRotorPosition(metersToMotor(
390        _primaryMotorInverted ? (-1 * _elevatorSim.getPositionMeters())
391                              : _elevatorSim.getPositionMeters()
392    ));
393    _primaryMotorSim.setRotorVelocity(metersToMotor(
394        _primaryMotorInverted ? (-1 * _elevatorSim.getVelocityMetersPerSecond())
395                              : _elevatorSim.getVelocityMetersPerSecond()
396    ));
397    _primaryMotorSim.setRotorAcceleration(
398        metersToMotor(_primaryMotorInverted ? (-1 * simAccelMPS2) : simAccelMPS2)
399    );
400    _elevatorStage1.setLength(
401        (_elevatorConf.lineLength * _elevatorSim.getPositionMeters() / _elevatorMaxHeightM)
402    );
403    _primaryMotorSim.setSupplyVoltage(RobotController.getBatteryVoltage());
404    RoboRioSim.setVInVoltage(
405        BatterySim.calculateDefaultBatteryLoadedVoltage(_elevatorSim.getCurrentDrawAmps())
406    );
407  }
408
409  @Override
410  public void updateShuffleboard() {
411    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
412      return;
413    }
414    if (_isShuffleboardMicro) {
415      _currentPositionEntry.setDouble(getElevatorHeightM());
416      _currentVelocityEntry.setDouble(getElevatorVelocityMPS());
417    }
418  }
419
420  /**
421   * Configure shuffleboard for the elevator
422   */
423  @Override
424  public void configShuffleboard() {
425    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
426      return;
427    }
428    super.configShuffleboard();
429  }
430
431  /**
432   * Converts motor rotations to elevator height
433   *
434   * @param rotation motor position in rotations
435   * @return elevator position in meters
436   */
437  public double motorToMeters(double rotation) {
438    return _isMicrosystemDisabled
439        ? 0.0
440        : (rotation * _elevatorConf.drumCircumference) / _motorToMechRatio;
441  }
442
443  /**
444   * Converts elevator height to motor rotations
445   *
446   * @param meter elevator position in meters
447   * @return motor position in rotations
448   */
449  public double metersToMotor(double meter) {
450    return _isMicrosystemDisabled ? 0.0
451                                  : (meter / _elevatorConf.drumCircumference) * _motorToMechRatio;
452  }
453
454  /**
455   * Checks whether or not it's safe for the elevator to move
456   *
457   * @return whether or not it's safe to move
458   */
459  public boolean isSafeToMove() {
460    return true;
461  }
462
463  /**
464   * Bounds checking function that uses the current elevator position
465   *
466   * @param lowerBound minimum of acceptable range
467   * @param upperBound maximum of acceptable range
468   * @return if the current position is in specified acceptable range
469   */
470  public boolean isElevatorInTolerance(double lowerBound, double upperBound) {
471    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
472      return true;
473    }
474    return AlgebraicUtils.inTolerance(getElevatorHeightM(), lowerBound, upperBound);
475  }
476
477  /**
478   * Sets the position of the elevator in meters
479   *
480   * @param height goal position in meters
481   */
482  public void setElevatorHeight(double height) {
483    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
484      return;
485    }
486    _primaryMotor.setPosition(metersToMotor(height));
487  }
488
489  @Override
490  public void holdCurrentPosition() {
491    setElevatorProfile(getElevatorHeightM(), 0.0);
492    setFollowProfile(true);
493  }
494}
